title: Capelli New York Toddlers Slip On EVA Sneaker with Toe Cap
features: Toddler girls sneakers made from ultra lightweight materials for all day comfort.
Designed with a convenient slip-on design for quick on and off, perfect shoe for a day at the beach or just a day outside.
Ventilated body with air holes which allow feet to breath and reduce odor. These airholes are also perfect when coming in contact with water for quick drainage.
These Capelli New York EVA sneakers come in a variety of colors and prints perfect for any outfit.
Ethylene Vinyl Acetate sole which make this item easy to clean. Wipe clean with damp cloth.
description: Spend the summer in our fabulous Capelli New York slip on EVA sneakers! Our fashion forward and fun styles offer lightweight comfort , perfect for going to the beach or just a day outside. All Capelli New York EVA sneakers are made from high quality materials and are exclusive designs at a great price. They go great with any summer outfit!
